data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sureshan, Pavittu M. (2017): A taxonomic review of the Indian species of the genus Eumenes Latreille (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae). Zootaxa 4317 (3): 469-498, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4317.3.3|85 occurrences
